JobTitle: Sr Product Manager - Marketplace Pricing - Uber Freight
JobFullDesc: About the RoleUber Freight connects shippers with truckers, much like how Uber connects riders and drivers. We are a team of sharp, entrepreneurial individuals who are redefining the movement of things around the world. On the Uber Freight team, we fiercely believe that our dedication to transportation technologies will bring more harmonious, highly efficient, and increasingly safer transportation logistics to our roads. To that end, we are seeking a data-minded Product Manager for our Marketplace Dynamics team focused on Shipper Pricing. As a Marketplace Dynamics PM, you will be responsible for leading a cross-functional team building the "brains" of the marketplace. Specifically, you will work on driving Uber Freight's growth with smart shipper pricing solutions that span from tools to algorithms. If you get excited by a user-first approach to building marketplaces and leveraging world class data expertise to execute on your vision, this is the perfect role for you. What the Candidate Will DoUse data-driven methodologies to grow our business while balancing supply and demand.Define and communicate product plans from conception to launch.Use your technical expertise to question, understand, and challenge software implementation decisions and priorities.Analyze the results of a launch and create the plan to iterate and build new features.Prioritize features based on business impact and available resources.Contribute to technical conversations around deadlines and engineering solutions.Drive product research priorities for the research team.Basic QualificationsExperience building 0 to 1 products, or scaling existing products. (B2B / B2C)Experience working alongside design teams / UX exposure along with cross-functional counterparts
